Hi,

One more addition to "Windows XP" problem.

"heritrix-1.4.0.zip"  does=
n't contain the default profile. 
I tried in Linux (with same zip file),  i=
t works without the default profile.
I could not go deep into this, where t=
his default profile is taken or created (without physical profile file).

S=
olution: 
1. Create a directory "profiles" in <Heritrix_home>/conf/ 
2. Cop=
y default profiles from  "heritrix-1.4.0-src.zip" --> src/conf/profiles/*.*=


Now Heritrix works as given in the "user manual" chapter 4.
**********
ht=
tp://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual.html#tutorial
**********


Th=
anks,
Subramanya C R
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Kent Gibson 
  T=

  Sent: Thursday, August 04, 2005 2:43 =
AM
  Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Running Heritrix on Windows XP


  than=
ks for sharing this, I gave up a while back
  because I was having so many =
problems but soon I want
  to try again. If you have any other stuff to sha=
re in
  regards to Heritrix on windows now or the future it
  would be grea=
t if you could share it.
